mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS IdenticalCouponCOUNT FROM (SELECT coupon_num FROM tb_app WHERE (coupon_num > '' AND coupon_num IS NOT NULL AND coupon_num = #{coupon_num}) UNION ALL SELECT coupon_num FROM tb_contents WHERE (coupon_num > '' AND coupon_num IS NOT NULL AND coupon_num = #{coupon_num}) UNION ALL SELECT coupon_num FROM tb_inapp WHERE (coupon_num > '' AND coupon_num IS NOT NULL AND coupon_num = #{coupon_num})) x;

SELECT a.app_seq as appSeq, a.reg_gb as regGb, a.app_name as appName, a.app_contents_amt as appContentsAmt, a.app_contents_gb as appContentsGb, a.file_name as fileName, a.ostype as ostype, a.ver_num as verNum, b.bundle_name as storeBundleId, a.provision_gb as provisionGb, a.icon_org_file as iconOrgFile, a.description_text as descriptionText, a.icon_save_file as iconSaveFile, a.template_name as templateName, a.template_seq as templateSeq, a.chg_text as chgText, a.use_gb as useGb, DATE_FORMAT(a.use_avail_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as useAvailDt, DATE_FORMAT(a.use_disable_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as useDisableDt, a.complet_gb as completGb, a.distr_gb as distrGb, a.limit_gb as limitGb, DATE_FORMAT(a.limit_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as limitDt, a.mem_down_gb as memDownGb, a.mem_down_cnt as memDownCnt, a.mem_down_amt as memDownAmt, DATE_FORMAT(a.mem_down_start_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as memDownStartDt, DATE_FORMAT(a.mem_down_end_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as memDownEndDt, a.coupon_gb as couponGb, a.coupon_num as couponNum, a.nonmem_down_gb as nonmemDownGb, a.nonmem_down_cnt as nonmemDownCnt, a.nonmem_down_amt as nonmemDownAmt, DATE_FORMAT(a.nonmem_down_star_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as nonmemDownStarDt, DATE_FORMAT(a.nonmem_down_end_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as nonmemDownEndDt, a.install_gb as installGb, a.version_code as versionCode, a.reg_user_seq as regUserSeq, a.reg_user_id as regUserId, a.reg_user_gb as regUserGb, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as regDt, a.chg_user_seq as chgUserSeq, a.chg_user_id as chgUserId, a.chg_user_gb as chgUserGb, DATE_FORMAT(a.chg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as chgDt, a.app_size as appSize, a.app_resultCode as app_resultCode, a.use_user_gb as useUserGb, a.app_schema as appSchema, a.app_host as appHost, DATE_FORMAT(a.distribute_req_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as distributeReqDt, DATE_FORMAT(a.chg_contents_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as chgContentsDt, DATE_FORMAT(a.distribute_complet_dt, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s') as distributeCompletDt, a.distribute_accept_id as distributeAcceptId, a.distribute_request_id as distributeRequestId FROM tb_app AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_bundle AS b ON a.app_seq = b.app_seq WHERE b.bundle_name = #{store_bundle_id} AND a.complet_gb = '1' AND a.use_gb = '1'
AND (a.ostype = '1' OR a.ostype = '2' OR a.ostype = '3')
AND a.ostype = '4'
ORDER BY a.use_Gb DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT complet_gb FROM tb_inapp WHERE inapp_seq = #{inapp_seq} ;

INSERT INTO tb_inapphistory(store_bundle_id,inapp_name,ver_num,category_seq,category_name,description_text,inapp_org_file,inapp_save_file,inapp_url,icon_org_file,icon_save_file,use_gb,use_avail_dt,use_disable_dt,complet_gb,distr_gb,limit_gb,limit_dt,mem_down_gb,mem_down_cnt,mem_down_amt,mem_down_start_dt,mem_down_end_dt,coupon_gb,coupon_num,nonmem_down_gb,nonmem_down_cnt,nonmem_down_amt,nonmem_down_star_dt,nonmem_down_end_dt,reg_user_seq,reg_user_id,reg_user_gb,reg_dt,chg_user_seq,chg_user_id,chg_user_gb,chg_dt,inapp_size,use_user_gb,screen_type, distribute_req_dt, chg_contents_dt, distribute_complet_dt) SELECT store_bundle_id,inapp_name,ver_num,category_seq,category_name,description_text,inapp_org_file,inapp_save_file,inapp_url,icon_org_file,icon_save_file,use_gb,use_avail_dt,use_disable_dt,complet_gb,distr_gb,limit_gb,limit_dt,mem_down_gb,mem_down_cnt,mem_down_amt,mem_down_start_dt,mem_down_end_dt,coupon_gb,coupon_num,nonmem_down_gb,nonmem_down_cnt,nonmem_down_amt,nonmem_down_star_dt,nonmem_down_end_dt,reg_user_seq,reg_user_id,reg_user_gb,reg_dt,chg_user_seq,chg_user_id,chg_user_gb,chg_dt,inapp_size,use_user_gb,screen_type, distribute_req_dt, chg_contents_dt, distribute_complet_dt FROM tb_inapp WHERE inapp_seq = #{inapp_seq} ;

SELECT app_contents_amt as appContentsAmt, app_contents_gb as appContentsGb, app_name as appName, file_name as fileName, ver_num as verNum, version_code as versionCode, template_name as templateName, template_seq as templateSeq, description_text as descriptionText, chg_text as chgText, icon_org_file as iconOrgFile, icon_save_file as iconSaveFile, login_gb as loginGb, use_gb as useGb, use_user_gb as useUserGb, install_gb as installGb, distr_gb as distrGb, mem_down_gb as memDownGb, mem_down_amt as memDownAmt, mem_down_start_dt as memDownStartDt, mem_down_end_dt as memDownEndDt, coupon_gb as couponGb, nonmem_down_gb as nonmemDownGb, nonmem_down_amt as nonmemDownAmt, nonmem_down_star_dt as nonmemDownStarDt, nonmem_down_end_dt as nonmemDownEndDt, complet_gb as completGb, reg_gb as regGb FROM tb_app WHERE app_seq = #{app_seq} ;

SELECT inapp_name as inappName, ver_num as verNum, category_seq as categorySeq, category_name as categoryName, description_text as descriptionText, inapp_org_file as inappOrgFile, inapp_save_file as inappSaveFile, icon_org_file as iconOrgFile, icon_save_file as iconSaveFile, use_gb as useGb, use_user_gb as useUserGb, screen_type as screenType, complet_gb as completGb FROM tb_inapp WHERE inapp_seq = #{inapp_seq} ;
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_inapp WHERE store_bundle_id = #{store_bundle_id} ;

SELECT inapp_seq as inappSeq, inapp_name as inappName, ver_num as verNum, description_text as descriptionText, inapp_org_file as inappOrgFile, inapp_save_file as inappSaveFile, reg_user_seq as regUserSeq, reg_user_id as regUserId, reg_user_gb as regUserGb, reg_dt as regDt, chg_dt as chgDt, chg_contents_dt as chgContentsDt FROM tb_inapp WHERE store_bundle_id = #{store_bundle_id} ;

SELECT reg_gb as regGb, app_name as appName, app_contents_amt as appContentsAmt, app_contents_gb as appContentsGb, file_name as fileName, ostype as ostype, store_bundle_id as storeBundleId, provision_gb as provisionGb, icon_org_file as iconOrgFile, icon_save_file as iconSaveFile, template_name as templateName, template_seq as templateSeq, use_gb as useGb, version_code as versionCode, chg_text as chgText FROM tb_app WHERE app_seq = #{app_seq} ;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_app (reg_gb, app_name, app_contents_amt, app_contents_gb, file_name, ostype, ver_num, store_bundle_id, provision_gb, icon_org_file, icon_save_file, template_name, template_seq, use_gb, use_avail_dt, complet_gb, limit_gb, reg_user_seq, reg_user_id, reg_user_gb, reg_dt, chg_user_seq, chg_user_id, chg_user_gb, chg_dt, app_resultCode, install_gb, version_code, use_user_gb, login_gb, chg_text) values (#{regGb}, #{appName}, #{appContentsAmt}, #{appContentsGb}, #{fileName}, #{ostype}, #{verNum}, #{storeBundleId}, #{provisionGb}, #{iconOrgFile}, #{iconSaveFile}, #{templateName}, #{templateSeq}, #{useGb}, #{useAvailDt}, #{completGb}, #{limitGb}, #{regUserSeq}, #{regUserId}, #{regUserGb}, #{regDt}, #{chgUserSeq}, #{chgUserId}, #{chgUserGb}, #{chgDt}, #{app_resultCode}, #{installGb}, #{versionCode}, #{useUserGb}, #{loginGb}, #{chgText}) ;
select MAX(app_seq) FROM tb_app;
mapper.select: SELECT prov_seq as provSeq, bundle_name as bundleName, os_type as osType, prov_test_gb as provTestGb FROM tb_bundle WHERE bundle_seq IN ( SELECT bundle_seq FROM tb_bundle WHERE app_seq=#{app_seq} ) GROUP BY prov_seq, bundle_name, os_type, prov_test_gb ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_bundle (app_seq, prov_seq, bundle_name, os_type, prov_test_gb) values (#{appSeq}, #{provSeq}, #{bundleName}, #{osType}, #{provTestGb}) ;
mapper.select: SELECT ver_num as verNum, file_name as fileName, store_bundle_id as storeBundleId, ostype as ostype, description_text as descriptionText, template_seq as templateSeq, app_contents_amt as appContentsAmt, reg_gb as regGb, app_name as appName, chg_text as chgText, app_seq as appSeq, provision_gb as provisionGb, version_code as versionCode, icon_org_file as iconOrgFile, icon_save_file as iconSaveFile FROM tb_app WHERE app_seq = #{app_seq} ;

SELECT bundle.prov_seq as provSeq, bundle.prov_test_gb as provTestGb, provision.distr_profile_name as distrProfileName FROM tb_bundle bundle, tb_provision provision WHERE bundle.prov_seq = provision.prov_seq AND bundle.bundle_seq = ( SELECT bundle_seq FROM tb_bundle WHERE app_seq=#{appSeq} AND prov_seq=#{provSeq} GROUP BY bundle_seq ) ;

SELECT bundle.prov_seq as provSeq, provision.prov_name as provName FROM tb_bundle bundle, tb_provision provision WHERE bundle.prov_seq = provision.prov_seq AND bundle.bundle_seq IN ( SELECT bundle_seq FROM tb_bundle WHERE app_seq=#{app_seq} ) GROUP BY bundle.prov_seq, provision.prov_name ;
SELECT max(app.ver_num) FROM( SELECT ver_num FROM tb_app WHERE store_bundle_id=( SELECT store_bundle_id FROM tb_app WHERE app_seq=#{app_seq} ) ) app ;
